product_description: A chic mix of smooth leather and velvety suede highlights a platform sandal with a soaring stacked heel, curvy shield and slingback strap.
product_details_and_care:
A chic mix of smooth leather and velvety suede highlights a platform sandal with a soaring stacked heel, curvy shield and slingback strap.
4 3/4" heel; 1 1/4" platform (size 8.5)
Adjustable strap with buckle closure
Leather upper/synthetic lining and sole
Imported
Women's Shoes
Item #5835217
